title: big problem with framedrops!
body:
hello everybody, i got a big problem since yesterday with my league of legends.

i started yesterday a duoq ranked and my cpu usage went to 100% for some reason! it just happens when i started lol. 
i figured out that my x-boost from msi causes this. 
okay, disabled that and gave another try.
didnt matter my frames drop from 240, to 60 then goin up again. 
pre yesterday the game worked very well for me.

games like pubg are running smoothly and stable...

my specs are:

win 10 15063.502
amd r5 1600x 4.00
asus strix 1070
16gb ram
144hz display aoc agon 27"
ssd 120
m2 ssd 520
hdd 3tb

nvidia driver is up to date.

thanks for reading

replies.body: After taking a look I realize i'm not equipped to help, so let's get you on over to our amazing [Tech Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) who can look into this and get you back in the game.
